author: A_Brickset_user
title: We need more sets like this!
review:
This set was sold in a "three-pack" with two other town sets(I don't remember which ones. There were two different packs, one of them contained a black go-cart with a blue man.(boxed) (I think some of the other four sets are missing on brickset))

I only got one copy of this set, but I want to buy at least 19 more.

author: asianlego
title: Your mail, sir!
review: This is one of Lego's finest impulse sets. For a measly RM 14.90 ($4) you get a nice bicycle (which aren't easy to get), a swing-down box with a Royal Legoland Mail logo on it (another rare item to find, even without the logo), and two letters. The bike also comes with a small basket that hangs at the back to hold the letters. The minifig is a postman which is a very nice thing to have in your town layout back then.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Postal) - Mail Carrier Review
review:
This is a good little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Parts

This set has 12 pieces and it was 2 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 17 cents per piece which is a really good value for a set like this.

Minifigures

The figure has a red overall, a red cap and white hair on the face.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/6420-1.jpg[/img]


This set may doesn't do much but it's a good addition to any LEGO city for sure. We get a good looking bike and we also get a mailbox which you can open and we also get some mail which you can put into the mailbox.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de


Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: city_transport_rox
title: Cute and useful
review: A great set that can help out the worker at the post office, or ride his bike around town delivering letters. This set comes with a cool minifig, yellow bike, mailbox, and mail carrier with 2 letters.
